author: Sarah Krouse
title: Berkshire Hathaway’s Business Wire Suffers Cyberattack
text:
Business Wire, the corporate news-release distributor owned by billionaire Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc., is experiencing a cyberattack that has caused some outages for nearly a week.
The firm, which is one of the largest distributors of corporate news releases and regulatory filings, suffered a denial-of-service attack, the company said. It told customers Tuesday that the “directed and persistent” attack began Jan. 31.
...
